<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Pair Node Formatting

Represents a key/value pair (e.g. a part of the `Hash` node)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
{ 'foo': bar, :baz => foo }
```

After:

```ruby
{ foo: bar, baz: foo }
```

## Formats and retains string keys

Before:

```ruby
{ 'foo' => bar, :baz => foo }
```

After:

```ruby
{ "foo" => bar, baz: foo }
```
